name: Zero End: Chapter One
description:
Despite not having applied, you got into Altham Academy.
Your gut feeling is right. There is something very wrong going on here.
From here on out, your choices will shape not only your own future, but that of those around you as well.
Will you uncover the mystery at the heart of this place or will it swallow you whole, like it has many others before you?
But you're a magician. You'll be fine, right?

Uncover the mystery


Find the truth behind the events happening at Altham Academy.

Class and Attribute system


- Choose a patron deity and they may offer assistance when you most need it.
- Develop your skills through your choices and pass the skill checks for interesting outcomes.

Find Love


Even in the darkest of times, love may sprout from the most unexpected of places. Engage with any of the multiple love interests, grow closer to them, learn their stories and build something that will last. Or engage in singular moments of passion. The choice is yours.

Chapter One contains the first three days of the story.
